scripts.build: npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.build:chrome: tsc -b && vite build --mode chrome && vite build --mode chrome --config vite.content.config.ts
scripts.build:firefox: tsc -b && vite build --mode firefox && vite build --mode firefox --config vite.content.config.ts && vite build --mode firefox --config vite.background.config.ts
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist/chrome && zip -r ../oc-chrome.zip .
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../oc-firefox.zip .
scripts.package: npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox
scripts.watch:chrome: concurrently "pnpm run watch:ts" "vite build --mode chrome --watch" "vite build --mode chrome --config vite.content.config.ts --watch"
scripts.watch:firefox: concurrently "pnpm run watch:ts" "vite build --mode firefox --watch" "vite build --mode firefox --config vite.content.config.ts --watch" "vite build --mode firefox --config vite.background.config.ts --watch"
